q: and Congress. On Dec. 10, Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours. His words are being assembled into a book entitled The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. for New York's junior senator, Kirsten Gillibrand , since her friend Rep. Gabrielle Giffords was gunned down in Arizona. But one thing that hasn't changed for the Democrat is that she feels comfortable in her state. I'm not worried about my safety, and I feel very safe everywhere in our state, and I feel safe doing my job, Kirsten Gillibrand said after visiting Gabrielle Giffords yesterday and seeing the remarkable strides she's made since a lunatic turned a mundane supermarket meet-and-greet into a scene of horror.
